Selection chairman Trevor Hohns was at the ground and was on the phone soon after Burns failed. He and fellow selectors Justin Langer and George Bailey now face a major call.
Border said he would no… [+4061 chars]

articles.title: Joe Burns, Marcus Harris fail to fire ahead of first Test against India, Mitchell Starc returns to Australia squad - ABC News
articles.description: Joe Burns and Marcus Harris leave Australian selectors no closer to deciding on their batting line-up, while Mitchell Starc joins the Test squad ahead of the day-night clash against India in Adelaide.
articles.content: Joe Burns and Marcus Harris have failed to impress with the bat in their final hit-out before the first Test against India, both being dismissed cheaply in Australia A's second innings against the to… [+3406 chars]
